info.title: DomoFace Intercom API
info.description:
Description of functionality and software API of DomoFace intercom.
Copyright © DomoFace. All rights reserved.

User account management
The DomoFace intercom is controlled by three user roles: "Admin", "Operator" and "User". The "Admin" has full access to all settings and can create and delete other accounts. The "Operator" has access only to edit settings. The "User" has access to view RTSP-stream, edit PIN-codes, QR-codes and faces from their flat and open door. The "Admin" account is always present in the system with the username "admin" and the default password, which is calculated by formula "Df7#" + MD5(ID of the intercom). When creating a new account, the password for it is stored in the intercom in the form of a hash of the Argon2 sum, which ensures the safe storage of accounts.

Basic device settings
The intercom system supports setting the range of apartments in a residential building, the duration of calls and opening the door, the volume and amplification of the microphone and speaker with the possibility of dynamic amplification of sound.

Type of matrix switcher
The intercom system supports matrix switches METAKOM, CYFRAL and VIZIT.

SIP
The DomoFace intercom supports SIP according to the standards RFC 3261, RFC 3264, RFC 3515, RFC 3891, RFC 3892, RFC 3420, RFC 4488, RFC 3311, RFC 3262, RFC 3966, RFC 4028.

Audio codecs: Speex (8KHz, 16KHz, 32KHz), iLBC, GSM, L16, G.711A/U (PCMA, PCMU), G.722, G.722.1 (16KHz, 32KHz).
AEC (acoustic echo cancellation): Speex.
Video codecs: H.263, H.264.

SIP standarts:

  • Digest authentication (RFC 2617)
  • DNS SRV (RFC 3263)
  • NAT (RFC 3489)
  • rport (RFC 3581)
  • Service-Route header (RFC 3608)
  • SIP outbound for TCP/TLS (RFC 5626)
  • Path header (with SIP outbound) (RFC 3327)
  • SDP (RFC 2327), SDP RTCP (RFC 3605), SDP IPv6 (RFC 3266)
  • Multipart (RFC 2046, RFC 5621)
  • RTP/RTCP with media statistic (RFC 3550, RFC 3551)
  • RTCP XR (subset, RFC 3611)
  • Symmetric RTP/RTCP (RFC 4961)
  • Multiplexing RTP/RTCP (rtcp-mux) (RFC 5671)
  • STUN (RFC 5389)
  • TURN (RFC 5766), TURN TCP allocations (RFC 6062)
  • ICE (RFC 5245), ICE option tag (RFC 5768)
  • SRTP (RFC 3711), SRTP SDES (RFC 4568), DTLS-SRTP (RFC 5763)
  • QoS (DSCP, WMM)
  • DTMF (RFC 4733, RFC 2833)

RFID keys
The intercom system supports RFID keys such as MIFARE. It is possible to automatically collect RFID keys, when the mode is on, the intercom remembers all the used RFID keys, and the door opens.

PIN-codes
The door can be opened with a pre-set PIN-code with more digits than number of apartments in the house.

QR-codes
The door can be opened with a QR-codes.

Biometric identification (face recognition)
The biometric function of identifying a person from a face picture is available. Biometric snapshots of photos are stored in anonymous format without the possibility of reverse recovery of the original photo.

get.description: Get users. Has access: "Admin".

delete.description: Reset all users. Create "admin" account with default password. Has access: "Admin".

get.description: Get current authorized user. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User".
Get user by ID. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User". "Operator" and "User" roles can only request themselves.

delete.description: Delete user by ID. If you will delete "admin" account, API will automatically create new "admin" account with default password. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User". "Operator" and "User" roles can only delete themselves.

patch.description: Update user by ID. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User". "Operator" and "User" roles can update only their password.

get.description: Intercom health check. Always return 200 OK. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User".
Get info about the intercom such as device ID, software/hardware versions, etc. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".
Get intercom settings. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

delete.description: Reset all intercom settings. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

get.description: Get dump file with all intercom settings. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

post.description: Delete all intercom settings and restore dump from file. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

delete.description: Reset all flats settings. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

get.description: Get flat settings. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

delete.description: Reset flat settings. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

get.description: Get camera RTSP. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User".
Get camera main stream snapshot. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User".
Get camera sub stream snapshot. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User".

post.description: Manual enable IR cut. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".
Manual disable IR cut. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

get.description: Get SIP flats credential. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

delete.description: Reset SIP flats credential. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

patch.description: Update SIP flats credential. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

get.description: Get SIP emergency credential. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

delete.description: Reset SIP emergency credential. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

patch.description: Update SIP emergency credential. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

get.description: Get SIP flats TURN server settings. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

delete.description: Reset SIP flats TURN server settings. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

patch.description: Update SIP flats TURN server settings. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

get.description: Get SIP emergency TURN server settings. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

delete.description: Reset SIP emergency TURN server settings. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

patch.description: Update SIP emergency TURN server settings. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

get.description: Get SIP STUN servers. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

post.description: Add new SIP STUN server. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

delete.description: Delete all SIP STUN servers. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

get.description: Get SIP STUN server by ID. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".
get.summary: Get SIP STUN server by ID

delete.description: Delete SIP STUN server by ID. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".
delete.summary: Delete SIP STUN server by ID

get.description: Get flat SIP accounts. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

post.description: Add new flat SIP account. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

delete.description: Delete all flat SIP accounts. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

get.description: Get flat SIP account by ID. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".
get.summary: Get flat SIP account by ID

delete.description: Delete flat SIP accounts by ID. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".
delete.summary: Delete flat SIP accounts by ID

patch.description: Update flat SIP account by ID. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".
patch.summary: Update flat SIP account by ID

get.description: Get emergency SIP accounts. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

post.description: Add new emergency SIP account. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

delete.description: Delete all emergency SIP accounts. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

get.description: Get emergency SIP account by ID. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".
get.summary: Get emergency SIP account by ID

delete.description: Delete emergency SIP accounts by ID. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".
delete.summary: Delete emergency SIP account by ID

patch.description: Update emergency SIP account by ID. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".
patch.summary: Update emergency SIP account by ID

get.description: Get dump file with all RFID keys. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

post.description: Delete all RFID keys and restore dump from file. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

get.description: Get all RFID keys. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

post.description: Add new RFID key. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

delete.description: Delete all RFID keys. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

get.description: Get RFID key by ID. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

delete.description: Delete RFID key by ID. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

get.description: Get dump file with all PIN codes. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

post.description: Delete all PIN codes and restore dump from file.  Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

get.description: Get PIN codes. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User". "User" role can request PIN codes only from their flat.

post.description: Add new PIN code. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User". "User" role can add new PIN code only into their flat.

delete.description: Delete all PIN codes. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User". "User" role can delete PIN codes only from their flat.

get.description: Get PIN code by ID. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User". "User" role can request PIN codes only from their flat.

delete.description: Delete PIN code by ID. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User". "User" role can delete PIN codes only from their flat.

get.description: Get dump file with all QR codes. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

post.description: Delete all QR codes and restore dump from file. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

get.description: Get QR codes. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User". "User" role can request QR codes only from their flat.

post.description: Add new QR codes. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User". "User" role can add new QR code only into their flat.

delete.description: Delete all QR codes. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User". "User" role can delete QR codes only from their flat.

get.description: Get QR code by ID. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User". "User" role can request QR codes only from their flat.

delete.description: Delete QR code by ID. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User". "User" role can delete QR codes only from their flat.

get.description: Get dump file with all faces. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

post.description: Delete all faces and restore dump from file. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

get.description: Get faces. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User". "User" role can request faces only from their flat.

post.description: Add new face. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User". "User" role can add new face only into their flat.

delete.description: Delete all faces. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User". "User" role can delete faces only from their flat.

get.description: Get face by ID. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User". "User" role can request faces only from their flat.

delete.description: Delete face by ID. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User". "User" role can delete faces only from their flat.

patch.description: Update face by ID. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User". "User" role can update faces only from their flat.

get.description: Get face image by ID. Has access: "Admin", "Operator", "User". "User" role can request face images only from their flat.
Get line signal (ADC). The first flat is used by default. Has access: "Admin", "Operator".

server.description: SIP account server without "sip:" prefix in "HOST:PORT" format (RFC 3986). Port is optional.
STUN server in "HOST:PORT" format (RFC 3986). Port is optional.

code.description: QR code. Length - at least 16 symbols.

saveImage.description: Whether to save a person's photo?

server.description: SIP account server without "sip:" prefix in "HOST:PORT" format (RFC 3986). Port is optional.
SIP account server without "sip:" prefix in "HOST:PORT" format (RFC 3986). Port is optional.
STUN server in "HOST:PORT" format (RFC 3986). Port is optional.
SIP account server without "sip:" prefix in "HOST:PORT" format (RFC 3986). Port is optional.

useStun.description: Use STUN for the SIP signaling.

useStunMedia.description: Use STUN for the media transports.

useIce.description: Use ICE for the media transport.

server.description: SysLog server in "HOST:PORT" format. Port is optional.

connectionType.description: Type of SysLog connection, default UDP.

code.description: PIN code. Must be greater than 10 * the maximum apartment number.

data.description: HEX bytes data. Allowed letters: lowercase English letters (a-z), uppercase English letters (A-Z), digits (0-9). Maximum 16 length.

ring.description: Maximum duration of a call to an apartment (ms).

call.description: The maximum duration of the conversation (ms).

doorOpen.description: The time during which the door will be kept open (ms).

useCustomSettings.description: Use unique settings instead of global settings?

lineThresholds.description: The thresholds of the signal line.

min.description: The lower threshold of the line signal. Threshold = line voltage / 186.

max.description: The upper threshold of the line signal. Threshold = line voltage / 186.

code.description: PIN code. Must be greater than 10 * the maximum apartment number.
QR code. Length - at least 16 symbols.

server.description: SIP account server without "sip:" prefix in "HOST:PORT" format (RFC 3986). Port is optional.

password.description: User password. At least: one lowercase English letter (a-z), one uppercase English letter (A-Z), one digit (0-9), one special character (#?!@$%^&*-). Length - at least 8 symbols.
RTSP password. At least: one lowercase English letter (a-z), one uppercase English letter (A-Z), one digit (0-9). Length - at least 8 symbols and no more than 32.

data.description: HEX bytes data. Allowed letters: lowercase English letters (a-z), uppercase English letters (A-Z), digits (0-9). Maximum 16 length.

server.description: TURN server in "HOST:PORT" format (RFC 3986). Port is optional.

connectionType.description: Type of TURN connection, default UDP.

wbManualRed.description: Video manual white balance red level.

wbManualGreen.description: Video manual white balance green level.

wbManualBlue.description: Video manual white balance blue level.

agcMode.description: Is automatic gain control (AGC) mode enabled?

agcModeMaxGain.description: Maximum gain level in AGC mode (0..100).

agcModeTargetLevel.description: Required signal level at the amplifier output in AGC mode (0..100).

firstNumber.description: Number of the first apartment in the intercom.

lastNumber.description: Number of the last apartment in the intercom.

lineThresholds.description: The thresholds of the signal line.
